<S%G3588><s%> And They That <S%G1161><s%> Believing <S%G4103><s%> Have <S%G2192><s%> Masters, <S%G1203><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Let Them Not Despise Them, <S%G2706><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> They Are; <S%G1526><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Rather <S%G3123><s%> Let Them Serve Them, <S%G1398><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Believing Ones <S%G4103><s%> They Are <S%G1526><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Beloved <S%G27><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Good Service <S%G2108><s%> Are Being Helped By. <S%G482><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Teach <S%G1321><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Exhort. <S%G3870><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Teaches Other Doctrine, <S%G2085><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Draws Not Near <S%G4334><s%> Sound <S%G5198><s%> To Words, <S%G3056><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> ' According To <S%G2596><s%> Piety <S%G2150><s%> Teaching, <S%G1319><s%>

He Is Puffed Up, <S%G5187><s%> Nothing <S%G3367><s%> Knowing, <S%G1987><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Sick <S%G3552><s%> About <S%G4012><s%> Questions <S%G2214><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Disputes Of Words, <S%G3055><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Come <S%G1096><s%> Envy, <S%G5355><s%> Strife, <S%G2054><s%> Evil Speakings, <S%G988><s%> Suspicious <S%G5283><s%> Wicked, <S%G4190><s%>

<S%G2076><s%> But Is <S%G1161><s%> Gain <S%G4200><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Piety <S%G2150><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Contentment. <S%G841><s%>

<S%G3762><s%> For Nothing <S%G1063><s%> We Brought <S%G1533><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World, It Is <S%G2889><s%> Manifest <S%G1212><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Neither <S%G3761><s%> To Carry Out <S%G1627><s%> Anything <S%G5100><s%> Are We Able. <S%G1410><s%>
<S%G2192><s%> But Having <S%G1161><s%> Sustenance <S%G1305><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Coverings, <S%G4629><s%> With These <S%G5125><s%> We Shall Be Satisfied. <S%G714><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But Those <S%G1161><s%> Desiring <S%G1014><s%> To Be Rich, <S%G4147><s%> Fall <S%G1706><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Temptation <S%G3986><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Snare <S%G3803><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Desires <S%G1939><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Unwise <S%G453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hurtful, <S%G983><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> Sink <S%G1036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Destruction <S%G3639><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Perdition. <S%G684><s%>

<S%G4491><s%> For A Root <S%G1063><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Evils <S%G2556><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Love Of Money; <S%G5365><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Stretching After <S%G3713><s%> Were Seduced <S%G635><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Faith, <S%G4102><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Themselves <S%G1438><s%> Pierced <S%G4044><s%> With Sorrows <S%G3601><s%> Many. <S%G4183><s%>
